signup.title: Sign up
signup.displayNameHelp: This will appear on your profile

signUpSuccess.title: Welcome to Qcargan
signUpSuccess.subtitle: Confirm your email to activate your workspace.
signUpSuccess.confirmation: We just sent a confirmation link to your inbox. Open it to verify your account and unlock the dashboard.
signUpSuccess.tips: Check spam or promotions and add hola@quecargan.com to your safe sender list.

forgot.title: Reset Your Password
forgot.description: Type in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgot.successBody: If you registered using your email and password, you will receive a password reset email.

update.title: Reset Your Password
update.description: Please enter your new password below.

nav.sedanDesc: Comfortable, elegant and built for long-distance travel with a dedicated trunk.
nav.suvDesc: Spacious and versatile, perfect for families or weekend adventures.
nav.cityDesc: Agile and easy to park, ideal for dense urban living.
nav.pickupsDesc: Ready for work or cargo with flexible interior layouts.
nav.usedMarketplaceDesc: We are building a dedicated space to list, price and sell pre-loved EVs with verified buyers. Join the early access list and get notified when the marketplace launches.
nav.listVehicleDesc: Guided listing workflow with all EV-specific fields.
nav.transparentPricingDesc: Market insights help you set the right price.
nav.scheduleViewingsDesc: Coordinate visits with verified buyers in one place.
nav.financingDesc: Flexible financing options for every electric vehicle budget.
nav.electriciansDesc: Installation, maintenance and repair of home charging stations.
nav.workshopsDesc: Professional repairs and maintenance tailored for EVs.
nav.detailingDesc: Protective coatings and deep cleaning sessions for your vehicle.
nav.insuranceDesc: Quotes from insurers specialized in electric vehicles.
nav.financingServiceDesc: Compare interest rates and pick the plan that fits your journey.
nav.electriciansServiceDesc: Find certified EV electricians near you for safe charger installs.
nav.mechanicsServiceDesc: Diagnostics and maintenance from trusted EV technicians.
nav.detailingServiceDesc: Keep your car showroom fresh with curated detailing packages.
nav.insuranceServiceDesc: Protect your investment with coverage built for EV ownership.
nav.portableChargersDesc: Charge wherever you go with compact EV chargers.
nav.wallChargersDesc: Reliable home or office charging installations.
nav.accessoriesDesc: Upgrade your ride with curated accessories.
nav.portableChargersShopDesc: Bring backup power anywhere with compact chargers.
nav.wallChargersShopDesc: Fixed chargers with fast, safe energy delivery.
nav.accessoriesShopDesc: Personalize the experience with organizers and more.

pricing.title: Pricing & Availability
pricing.subtitle: {count, plural, =0 {No sellers available} one {Available at 1 seller} other {Available at # sellers}}
pricing.sellers: {count, plural, =0 {0 sellers} one {1 seller} other {# sellers}}

financing.title: Financing Options
financing.subtitle: Explore pre-approved financing from our partner banks

share.error: We couldn't share this vehicle. Try again.

contact.whatsappMessage: Hi! I'm interested in the {year} {brand} {model}. More info: {url}
contact.emailBody: Hi, I'm interested in the {year} {brand} {model}. Could you share more details? {url}
